vsnowm.configuration.title: VSNowm Configuration
vsnowm.configuration.defaultNoteRoot.mar: Path to directory to save notes. Use ~/ to denote a relative path from home folder. If you don't want to sync across machines, you can add vsnowm.defaultNoteRoot to settingsSync.ignoredSettings.
vsnowm.configuration.listRecentLimit.mar: Number of recent files to show when running command `List Notes`.
vsnowm.configuration.autoSyncIntervalSec: Interval seconds between automatically sync with remote repo.
